scripts.clean:reports: IF EXIST cypress\reports (rmdir /S /Q cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mocha && mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports) ELSE (mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mocha && mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports)
scripts.posttest:chrome: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test:chrome: npm run scripts:chrome || npm run posttest:chrome
scripts.posttest:firefox: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test:firefox: npm run scripts:firefox || npm run posttest:firefox
